TimeWise.name: 時光精靈/ 時光精靈3D系列

pd01.name: Youthfinity® The Serum
pd01.description: A full-effect essence that can maximize the regenerating energy of the skin. It melts into the skin as soon as it is applied, and instills the extraordinary life energy of the Youthfinity™ Alpen Rose complex into the skin, which simultaneously defends, rejuvenates and delays aging. It rejuenates the skin layer by layer, making it  become firmer and more delicate. The skin feels silky soft and smooth, and you can enjoy the most beautiful transformation.
pd01.usage:
• Use every morning and evening after cleansing and toning.
• With the following massage techniques, you can achieve the best sensory enjoyment and the product's skin rejuvenating effect:

Apply the products evenly on face and neck with your fingertips, avoiding eye area.
Starting from the center of the face, use your fingers to gently spread the essence upwards and outwards evenly.
pd01.function:
• Smoothes fine lines and wrinkles.
• Significantly improve skin firmness and elasticity.
•Extremely improve the overall texture and condition of the skin.
•Formulation features:
Passed Asian skin quality test, suitable for Asian skin
Fight against fatigue
Has a light and elegant floral fragrance
Not easy to cause acne
First use*:
• Skin texture becomes fine and smooth
• The skin regains its vitality
• The skin feels that the aging stressor is gradually relieved
• The skin is more radiant and brighter, feeling firmer and fuller
Three weeks of continuous usage*:
• The skin texture is significantly improved and becomes silky smooth
• Regain youthful vitality and energy
• Significantly improve the overall quality and condition of the skin
• Extremely enhance skin firmness and elasticity
• Use daily to significantly improve fine lines and wrinkles
• Skin glows with youthful radiance
*Independent consumer research results of women who continue to use the product in the morning and evening
pd01.principal_components:
The unique Youthfinity Infinite Complex™ rose complex, which combines three top anti-aging ingredients, activates the 3R Infinite Complex™ system, which provides three functions of defending, rejuvenating and delaying anti-aging:

RESIST protects against external environmental aggressions
-Alpen Rose : awakens the skin's natural protective barrier and resists various external environmental pressures.

REJUNVENATE revitalizes skin's full elasticity
-Evening Primrose: The essence extracted from the evening primrose seeds promotes the regeneration of skin proteins and revitalizes the skin's fullness, firmness and elasticity.

REDUCE delays internal aging of the skin<
•
Specially added active ingredient-nightweed leaf extract to help the skin's important protein proliferation, regain vitality from the inside, and show youthful vitality.

pd02.name: Youthfinity® The Facial Oil
pd02.description: The first facial essence oil by Mary Kay, which specially added rare 24K liquid gold peptides, injects powerful anti-aging peptides into the skin, promotes collagen production, and blends the endless beauty brought by the eternal rose with the endless luxury brought by the 24K liquid gold peptides. It replenishes the source of moisture, makes the skin firmer, and significantly reduces fine lines and wrinkles. The skin glows with youthful luster from the inside out and shines with unprecedented radiance.
pd02.usage:
• Use every morning and evening, after cleansing, toning and essence, and before using the cream. The facial essence oil can be used alone, or be mixed with face cream.
• Use the following massage techniques to bring endless luxury to your skin:

Take a few drops of the essential oil and rub it gently on the palm to warm it, gently press it on the skin to help absorption, then push it from the center of the face to the temples, and then from the center of the forehead to the temples.
Push the palm of your hand up to the earlobe along the bottom of the neck, and lift the skin of the face and neck from bottom to top.
To
Finally, gently make a circular motion to the temples and press gently, avoiding the eye area.
pd02.function:
Add rare 24K liquid gold peptides to promote collagen production1 and enhance skin firmness.

The precious ingredients Alpine Rose and Evening Primrose focus on resisting skin aging and anti-oxidanttion1, perfecting and firming the skin.

Visibly improves fine lines and wrinkles, and helps the skin regains softness and moisture.

Eau De Lune water moonlight exudes an elegant and quiet floral fragrance, which makes you indulge in the enjoyment of the senses, and also brings you the delicate, supple and beautiful skin.

Significantly improve skin density, enhance elasticity and toughness.


The ultimate testimony of clinical test results 2:

• 96% witnessed that the complexion is more radiant and radiant
• 92% witnessed that the skin's firmness and elasticity were significantly improved, and the skin texture was improved
• 91% witnessed healthier skin
• 88% witnessed significant improvement in fine lines and wrinkles
• 87% witnessed the skin becoming firmer and younger, glowing with youthful radiance
pd02.principal_components:
24K Liquid Gold Polypeptide: Improve the skin's internal structure and strength, promote collagen production1, and enhance skin firmness. It also contains moisturizing ceramides and plant-derived phytosterols, which help enhance the skin's barrier function and skin care effect3. With continuous use, the skin will be plumped, more elastic and younger.

Aspen Rose extract: awakens the skin's natural protective barrier, helps protect the skin against various environmental stresses, and solves the problem of skin aging.

Evening primrose: The essence extracted from evening primrose seeds helps revitalize the self-proliferation of skin matrix protein, intensively repairs the skin, revitalizes the skin's fullness, elasticity and firmness, and tightens the skin.

Squalane: Replenish the required lipids for the skin and form a breathable protective film on the surface of the skin, which can slow down the evaporation of moisture, play a moisturizing and emollient effect, and keep the skin healthy.

配方特點：
通過亞洲膚質測試，適合亞洲人肌膚
適合各種肌膚類型
不易堵塞毛孔
*女性持續早晚使用產品的獨立消費者研究結果
1 關鍵成分的體外測試結果
2 結果來自個別的獨立消費者研究，測試中252名亞洲女性使用產品21天，每天2次後給予評價
3 關鍵成分的體內測試結果Formula characteristics:
Passed Asian skin quality test, suitable for Asian skin
Suitable for all skin types types
Not easy to clog pores
*Independent consumer research results of women who continue to use the product in the morning and evening

2 The results come from individual independent consumer research. In the test, 252 Asian women used the product for 21 days and evaluated after 2 times a day3 In vivo test results of key ingredients

test.name: 臻時粹顏™精華油
test.description: 首款面部精華油，特別添加珍稀24K液體黃金多肽，將強大的抗衰老肽注入肌膚，促進膠原蛋白生成，令永恆玫瑰帶來的無盡美麗與24K液體黃金多肽帶來的無盡奢華相互交融。補充源源滋潤，使肌膚更緊緻，顯著改善細紋和皺紋，肌膚由內而外煥發青春光澤，綻放前所未有的至臻光芒。
test.usage:
• 每天早晚，潔面、爽膚及精華後、面霜前使用。 精華油既可以單獨使用，
亦可與面霜混合使用。
• 配合以下手法按摩，為您的肌膚帶來無盡奢寵 :

取數滴精華油在掌心輕搓暖和，輕柔按壓於肌膚幫助吸收，然後從臉部中央推至太陽穴，再從前額中央推至太陽穴。
手掌沿著頸部底部向上推至耳垂，由下而上提拉面部和頸部肌膚。

最後輕柔打圈至太陽穴，並輕柔按壓，避開眼周。
test.function:
添加珍稀24K液體黃金多肽，促進膠原蛋白產生1，提升肌膚緊實度。

珍貴成分阿爾卑斯玫瑰和月見草專注抵禦肌膚老化和抗氧化1，臻顔緊膚。

明顯改善細紋和皺紋，肌膚重拾柔軟滋潤。

散發雅緻清幽的花香Eau De Lune水月光，令你沉醉於感官的享受，更帶來嬌嫩欲滴的水光美肌。

明顯改善肌膚密度，增強彈性和强韌度。


臨床測試結果的臻極見證2:

• 96%見證膚色更富光澤，容光煥發
• 92%見證肌膚明顯提升緊實度及彈性，膚質得到改善
• 91%見證肌膚變得更健康
• 88%見證細紋及皺紋顯著改善
• 87%見證膚質變得更緊緻更年輕，煥發青春光芒
test.principal_components:
24K液體黃金多肽 : 提升肌膚的內在結構完整和強韌度，促進膠原蛋白的生成1，提升肌膚緊實度。還添加了具有滋潤保濕功效的神經酰胺和植物萃取的植物甾醇，有助提升肌膚屏障功能的護膚功效3。持續使用，肌膚更豐盈，更彈性，更年輕。

阿爾卑斯玫瑰萃取物 : 喚醒肌膚的天然防護屏障，幫助保護肌膚抵禦各種環境壓力侵害，從而解決肌膚表皮老化問題。

月見草 : 萃取自月見草籽的精華幫助煥活皮膚基質蛋白的自我增生，集中性修護肌膚，煥活肌膚的充盈、彈性及緊實度，臻顔緊膚。

角鯊烷 : 為肌膚補充需要的脂質，在皮膚表面形成一層透氣的保護膜，能減緩皮膚水分蒸發，發揮保濕、潤膚的效果，令肌膚保持健康狀態。

配方特點：
通過亞洲膚質測試，適合亞洲人肌膚
適合各種肌膚類型
不易堵塞毛孔
*女性持續早晚使用產品的獨立消費者研究結果
1 關鍵成分的體外測試結果
2 結果來自個別的獨立消費者研究，測試中252名亞洲女性使用產品21天，每天2次後給予評價
3 關鍵成分的體內測試結果
